data.lyric:
[ti:long story short]
[ar:Taylor Swift]

[00:00.00]long story short - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:03.17]Lyrics by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift
[00:06.35]Composed by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift
[00:09.52]Fatefully
[00:12.45]I tried to pick my battles 'til the battle picked me
[00:16.67]Misery
[00:18.68]Like the war of words I shouted in my sleep
[00:23.14]And you passed right by
[00:24.99]I was in the alley surrounded on all sides
[00:29.11]The knife cuts both ways
[00:30.72]If the shoe fits walk in it 'til your high heels break
[00:34.63]And I fell from the pedestal
[00:36.39]Right down the rabbit hole
[00:38.27]Long story short it was a bad time
[00:40.93]Pushed from the precipice
[00:42.59]Clung to the nearest lips
[00:44.22]Long story short it was the wrong guy
[00:47.42]Now I'm all about you
[00:50.85]I'm all about you ah
[00:53.50]Yeah yeah
[00:56.81]I'm all about you ah
[00:59.73]Yeah yeah
[01:04.76]Actually
[01:07.13]I always felt I must look better in the rear view
[01:11.46]Missing me
[01:13.45]At the golden gates they once held the keys to
[01:17.71]When I dropped my sword
[01:19.98]I threw it in the bushes and knocked on your door
[01:24.24]And we live in peace
[01:25.83]But if someone comes at us
[01:27.27]This time I'm ready
[01:29.29]'Cause I fell from the pedestal
[01:30.88]Right down the rabbit hole
[01:32.87]Long story short it was a bad time
[01:35.69]Pushed from the precipice
[01:37.35]Clung to the nearest lips
[01:38.98]Long story short it was the wrong guy
[01:42.07]Now I'm all about you
[01:45.51]I'm all about you ah
[01:48.15]Yeah yeah
[01:51.47]I'm all about you ah
[01:53.92]No more keeping score
[01:56.92]Now I just keep you warm
[01:59.34]Keep you warm
[02:00.22]No more tug of war
[02:03.15]Now I just know there's more
[02:05.44]Know there's more
[02:06.49]No more keeping score
[02:09.02]Now I just keep you warm
[02:11.52]Keep you warm
[02:12.11]
[02:13.62]And my waves meet your shore
[02:15.59]Ever and evermore
[02:17.97]Past me
[02:20.02]I wanna tell you not to get lost in these petty things
[02:23.99]Your nemeses
[02:26.17]Will defeat themselves before you get the chance to swing
[02:30.91]And he's passing by
[02:32.88]Rare as the glimmer of a comet in the sky
[02:36.84]And he feels like home
[02:38.70]If the shoe fits walk in it
[02:40.33]Everywhere you go
[02:42.60]And I fell from the pedestal
[02:44.37]Right down the rabbit hole
[02:46.01]Long story short it was a bad time
[02:48.82]Pushed from the precipice
[02:50.61]Climbed right back up the cliff
[02:52.03]Long story short I survived
[02:55.15]Now I'm all about you
[02:58.69]I'm all about you ah
[03:01.64]I'm all about you
[03:04.70]I'm all about you
[03:07.15]Yeah yeah
[03:10.57]I'm all about you
[03:13.72]Yeah yeah
[03:16.76]I'm all about you
[03:22.13]Long story short it was a bad time
[03:28.33]Long story short I survived
data.trans:
[ti:long story short]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.17]//
[00:06.35]//
[00:09.52]命中注定
[00:12.45]我也不想小题大做 只是我逃不过针对我的指摘
[00:16.67]苦不堪言
[00:18.68]就连睡梦中 我都仿佛在与人唇枪舌战
[00:23.14]而你冷漠的路过
[00:24.99]我走入穷途末路 四面楚歌
[00:29.11]刀剑向我刺过来
[00:30.72]如果从善如流是正确选择 那何妨坚持到底呢
[00:34.63]我曾从神坛跌落
[00:36.39]坠入绝望深渊中
[00:38.27]长话短说 那段时间很煎熬
[00:40.93]被推下悬崖
[00:42.59]谁靠近我 我就投入谁的怀中
[00:44.22]长话短说 命中注定不是他
[00:47.42]现在我只关心你
[00:50.85]我只在乎你
[00:53.50]//
[00:56.81]我只在乎你
[00:59.73]//
[01:04.76]说实话
[01:07.13]我总觉得 和他们分开后我更美些
[01:11.46]想念我
[01:13.45]他们徘徊在曾经可以轻松打开的金色大门前
[01:17.71]我放下了武器
[01:19.98]把它扔进丛林中 然后敲响了你的门
[01:24.24]我们平静地生活
[01:25.83]但如果谁要找我们麻烦
[01:27.27]这一次 我随时迎战
[01:29.29]因为我曾从神坛跌落
[01:30.88]坠入绝望深渊中
[01:32.87]长话短说 那段时间很煎熬
[01:35.69]被推下悬崖
[01:37.35]谁靠近我 我就投入谁的怀中
[01:38.98]长话短说 命中注定不是他
[01:42.07]现在我只关心你
[01:45.51]我只在乎你
[01:48.15]//
[01:51.47]我只在乎你
[01:53.92]不再斤斤计较
[01:56.92]现在我只想给你温暖
[01:59.34]给你温暖
[02:00.22]不再来回拉扯
[02:03.15]现在我知道什么更重要
[02:05.44]知道什么更重要
[02:06.49]不再斤斤计较
[02:09.02]现在我只想给你温暖
[02:11.52]给你温暖
[02:12.11]
[02:13.62]浪潮抵达海岸
[02:15.59]相伴到永远
[02:17.97]过去的我
[02:20.02]我想对你说 不要迷失在这些琐碎小事中
[02:23.99]你的敌人
[02:26.17]会在你还没出手的时候 就自食苦果
[02:30.91]他从身旁经过
[02:32.88]就像天空中的彗星光芒一样罕见
[02:36.84]他让人感觉温暖
[02:38.70]如果从善如流是正确选择
[02:40.33]那何妨坚持到底呢
[02:42.60]我曾从神坛跌落
[02:44.37]坠入绝望深渊中
[02:46.01]长话短说 那段时间很煎熬
[02:48.82]被推下悬崖
[02:50.61]却又爬了回来
[02:52.03]长话短说 我熬过来了
[02:55.15]现在我只关心你
[02:58.69]我只在乎你
[03:01.64]我只在乎你
[03:04.70]我只在乎你
[03:07.15]//
[03:10.57]我只在乎你
[03:13.72]//
[03:16.76]我只在乎你
[03:22.13]长话短说 那段时间很煎熬
[03:28.33]长话短说 我熬过来了
